HomePage.subtitle: Refresh your boat to perfection
HomePage.aboutIntro: We are a small mobile team that comes to your address to store your vessel for the season or dry berth. This frees you from the necessary actions so that you can spend your free time enjoying your vessel.

services.title: Underwater Hull Maintenance
services.description: To maintain optimal functionality and long-term protection of your vessel's underwater hull, we offer a comprehensive set of maintenance services, including:
features: Sanding the hull to remove imperfections
Sanding metal parts to remove old protective coating
Preparation and application of anti-fouling coating

services.title: Exterior Surface Maintenance
services.description: To achieve a flawless appearance and long-term protection of your vessel, we offer a full range of polishing and maintenance services for exterior surfaces, including:
features: Cleaning the vessel with high-pressure equipment
Removing oxidation by sanding for severe gelcoat damage
Deep cleaning of covers and cushions with chemicals
Polishing and protecting stainless steel parts

services.title: Interior Surface Maintenance
services.description: To achieve a flawless appearance and long-term protection of your vessel's interior spaces, we offer a comprehensive range of cleaning and maintenance services for all materials:

services.title: Heat-shrinkable films
services.description: For maximum protection and preservation of your vessel during storage and transport, we offer a complete shrink wrap film application service.
features: Proven best protection against weather (acid rain) and pollution.
Resistant to impacts of strong winds and speeds over 150 km/h
Patented matrix construction prevents shrink wrap film from tearing
Protection from UV rays that damage gelcoat
Protection from aggressive effects of seawater

services.title: Skipper Services
services.description: To ensure a safe and pleasant sailing experience for your vessel, we offer a full range of skipper services, including:
features: Organization of daily activities at sea
Ensuring the safety of crew and passengers

HomePage.contactSubtitle: For any questions or information, feel free to contact us by e-mail or phone

AboutUsPage.title: About Us
AboutUsPage.description: Seacraft Aesthetics is a small mobile team offering professional polishing of ships and arrangement of interior and exterior surfaces of vessels. Our passion for shipping and commitment to quality allows us to make your let's return the ship to a perfect condition. We specialize in polishing ships and interior and exterior decoration, using the most modern technologies and materials. Whether it's a detailed cleaning, renovation shine, or complete interior reconstruction, our expert team ensures top service and satisfaction for our clients. Trust me as your vessel and enjoy the flawless beauty and functionality we provide.

ServicesPage.title: Services
ServicesPage.subtitle: We provide services at your address!
